43211 Survey of investments: energy and water supply
==============================================
43221 Cost structure survey: energy and water supply
==============================================

Definition:
An enterprise is the smallest unit which, for reasons of
commercial and/or tax law, keeps accounts and prepares
balance sheets. Enterprises also include municipal
enterprises without legal capacity.
The variable values refer to the whole enterprise, including
the kind-of-activity units whose purpose is not energy and
water supply, but excluding branch establishments and
kind-of-activity units abroad.


45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
===============================================
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services
==================================================

Definition:
An enterprise is defined as the smallest legally independent
unit which, for reasons of commercial or trade tax law, must
keep accounts or similar records so that stock can be taken
of its assets every year.


47415 Structural survey of service activities
=======================================

Definition:
An enterprise is the smallest, legally independent entity
engaged in economic activity (a body for carrying out a
professional activity or an enterprise).
This statistical unit is both the survey unit and the unit
of presentation.
